verses.verse: "You are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God; <S%H430><s%> you shall not cut <S%H1413><s%> yourselves nor <S%H3808><s%> shave <S%H7760><s%> <S%H7144><s%> your forehead <S%H996><s%> <S%H5869><s%> for the sake of the dead. <S%H4191><s%>

"For you are a holy <S%H6918><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God; <S%H430><s%> and the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has chosen <S%H977><s%> you to be a people <S%H5971><s%> for His own possession <S%H5459><s%> out of all <S%H3605><s%> the peoples <S%H5971><s%> who <S%H834><s%> are on the face <S%H6440><s%> of the earth. <S%H127><s%>
"You shall not eat <S%H398><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> detestable <S%H8441><s%> thing. <S%H8441><s%>
"These <S%H2088><s%> are the animals <S%H929><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you may eat: <S%H398><s%> the ox, <S%H7794><s%> the sheep, <S%H3775><s%> <S%H7716><s%> the goat, <S%H5795><s%>

the deer, <S%H354><s%> the gazelle, <S%H6643><s%> the roebuck, <S%H3180><s%> the wild <S%H689><s%> goat, <S%H689><s%> the ibex, <S%H1788><s%> the antelope <S%H8377><s%> and the mountain <S%H2169><s%> sheep. <S%H2169><s%>

"And any <S%H3605><s%> animal <S%H929><s%> that divides <S%H6536><s%> the hoof <S%H6541><s%> and has <S%H8156><s%> the hoof <S%H8157><s%> split <S%H8156><s%> in two <S%H8147><s%> [and] chews <S%H5927><s%> the cud, <S%H1625><s%> among the animals, <S%H929><s%> that you may eat. <S%H398><s%>

"Nevertheless, <S%H389><s%> you are not to eat <S%H398><s%> of these <S%H2088><s%> among <S%H4480><s%> those which chew <S%H5927><s%> the cud, <S%H1625><s%> or among <S%H4480><s%> those that divide <S%H6536><s%> the hoof <S%H6541><s%> in two: <S%H8156><s%> the camel <S%H1581><s%> and the rabbit <S%H768><s%> and the rock-badger, for though they chew <S%H5927><s%> the cud, <S%H1625><s%> they do not divide <S%H6536><s%> the hoof; <S%H6541><s%> they are unclean <S%H2931><s%> for you.

"And the pig, <S%H2386><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> it divides <S%H6536><s%> the hoof <S%H6541><s%> but [does] not [chew] the cud, <S%H1625><s%> it is unclean <S%H2931><s%> for you. You shall not eat <S%H398><s%> any <S%H4480><s%> of their flesh <S%H1320><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> touch <S%H5060><s%> their carcasses. <S%H5038><s%>

"These <S%H2088><s%> you may eat <S%H398><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> that are in water: <S%H4325><s%> anything <S%H3605><s%> that has fins <S%H5579><s%> and scales <S%H7193><s%> you may eat, <S%H398><s%>
but anything <S%H3605><s%> that does not have <S%H369><s%> fins <S%H5579><s%> and scales <S%H7193><s%> you shall not eat; <S%H398><s%> it is unclean <S%H2931><s%> for you.
"You may eat <S%H398><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> clean <S%H2889><s%> bird. <S%H6833><s%>
"But these <S%H2088><s%> are the ones which <S%H834><s%> you shall not eat: <S%H398><s%> the eagle <S%H5404><s%> and the vulture <S%H6538><s%> and the buzzard, <S%H5822><s%>
and the red kite, <S%H1676><s%> the falcon, <S%H344><s%> and the kite <S%H1676><s%> in their kinds, <S%H4327><s%>
and every <S%H3605><s%> raven <S%H6158><s%> in its kind, <S%H4327><s%>
and the ostrich, <S%H3284><s%> the owl, <S%H8464><s%> the sea <S%H7828><s%> gull, <S%H7828><s%> and the hawk <S%H5322><s%> in their kinds, <S%H4327><s%>
the little <S%H9205><s%> owl, <S%H9205><s%> the great <S%H3244><s%> owl, <S%H3244><s%> the white <S%H8580><s%> owl, <S%H8580><s%>
the pelican, <S%H6893><s%> the carrion <S%H7360><s%> vulture, <S%H7360><s%> the cormorant, <S%H7994><s%>
the stork, <S%H2624><s%> and the heron <S%H601><s%> in their kinds, <S%H4327><s%> and the hoopoe <S%H1744><s%> and the bat. <S%H5847><s%>
"And all <S%H3605><s%> the teeming <S%H8318><s%> life <S%H8318><s%> with wings <S%H5775><s%> are unclean <S%H2931><s%> to you; they shall not be eaten. <S%H398><s%>
"You may eat <S%H398><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> clean <S%H2889><s%> bird. <S%H5775><s%>

"You shall not eat <S%H398><s%> anything <S%H3605><s%> which <S%H5038><s%> dies <S%H5038><s%> [of itself.] You may give <S%H5414><s%> it to the alien <S%H1616><s%> who <S%H834><s%> is in your town, <S%H8179><s%> so that he may eat <S%H398><s%> it, or <S%H176><s%> you may sell <S%H4376><s%> it to a foreigner, <S%H5237><s%> for you are a holy <S%H6918><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%> You shall not boil <S%H1310><s%> a kid <S%H1423><s%> in its mother's milk. <S%H2461><s%>

"You shall surely <S%H6237><s%> tithe <S%H6237><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the produce <S%H8393><s%> from what <S%H2233><s%> you sow, <S%H2233><s%> which comes <S%H3318><s%> out of the field <S%H7704><s%> every <S%H8141><s%> year. <S%H8141><s%>

"And you shall eat <S%H398><s%> in the presence <S%H6440><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> at the place <S%H4725><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> He chooses <S%H977><s%> to establish <S%H7931><s%> His name, <S%H8034><s%> the tithe <S%H4643><s%> of your grain, <S%H1715><s%> your new <S%H8492><s%> wine, <S%H8492><s%> your oil, <S%H3323><s%> and the first-born of your herd <S%H1241><s%> and your flock, <S%H6629><s%> in order <S%H4616><s%> that you may learn <S%H3925><s%> to fear <S%H3372><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> always. <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3117><s%>

"And if <S%H3588><s%> the distance <S%H1870><s%> is so great <S%H7235><s%> for you that you are not able <S%H3201><s%> to bring <S%H5375><s%> [the tithe,] since <S%H3588><s%> the place <S%H4725><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> chooses <S%H977><s%> to set <S%H7760><s%> His name <S%H8034><s%> is too far <S%H7368><s%> away from you when <S%H3588><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> blesses <S%H1288><s%> you,

then you shall exchange <S%H5414><s%> [it] for money, <S%H3701><s%> and bind <S%H6696><s%> the money <S%H3701><s%> in your hand <S%H3027><s%> and go <S%H1980><s%> to the place <S%H4725><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> chooses. <S%H977><s%>

"And you may spend <S%H5414><s%> the money <S%H3701><s%> for whatever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> your heart <S%H5315><s%> desires, <S%H183><s%> for oxen, <S%H1241><s%> or sheep, <S%H6629><s%> or wine, <S%H3196><s%> or strong <S%H7941><s%> drink, <S%H7941><s%> or whatever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> your heart <S%H5315><s%> desires; <S%H7592><s%> and there <S%H8033><s%> you shall eat <S%H398><s%> in the presence <S%H6440><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> and rejoice, <S%H8055><s%> you and your household. <S%H1004><s%>

"Also you shall not neglect <S%H5800><s%> the Levite <S%H3881><s%> who <S%H834><s%> is in your town, <S%H8179><s%> for he has <S%H369><s%> no <S%H369><s%> portion <S%H2506><s%> or inheritance <S%H5159><s%> among <S%H5973><s%> you.

"At the end <S%H7097><s%> of every third <S%H7969><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> you shall bring <S%H3318><s%> out all <S%H3605><s%> the tithe <S%H4643><s%> of your produce <S%H8393><s%> in that year, <S%H8141><s%> and shall deposit <S%H5117><s%> [it] in your town. <S%H8179><s%>

"And the Levite, <S%H3881><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> he has <S%H369><s%> no <S%H369><s%> portion <S%H2506><s%> or inheritance <S%H5159><s%> among <S%H5973><s%> you, and the alien, <S%H1616><s%> the orphan <S%H3490><s%> and the widow <S%H490><s%> who <S%H834><s%> are in your town, <S%H8179><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> and eat <S%H398><s%> and be satisfied, <S%H7646><s%> in order <S%H4616><s%> that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> may bless <S%H1288><s%> you in all <S%H3605><s%> the work <S%H4639><s%> of your hand <S%H3027><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you do. <S%H6213><s%>
